Room.Name: Melbourne Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Melbourne Avenue, east of Imeldia's Potions Shop.
Room.LongDescription: Imeldia provides a number of strange and unusual potions to the consumers. Unfortunately, not all of them are useful and some may actually be dangerous to drink. Not being a very good alchemist, Imeldia does not know, nor really cares what she sells. On the east side of the road is the Chug-A- Lug Pub, a downright rowdy local tavern where just about anything can happen.
